com.github.zk1931.jzab

Interface Log

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyLog, RollingLog, SimpleLog

    public interface Log
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface of manipulating transaction log.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Log.LogIterator
      Interface of iterating the transaction log.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(Transaction txn)
      Appends a request to transaction log.
      void close()
      Closes the log file and release the resource.
      Log.LogIterator getIterator(Zxid zxid)
      Gets an iterator to read transactions from this log starting at the given zxid (including zxid).
      Zxid getLatestZxid()
      Gets the latest transaction id from log.
      void sync()
      Syncs all the appended transactions to the physical media.
      void trim(Zxid zxid)
      Trim the log up to the transaction of zxid inclusively.
      void truncate(Zxid zxid)
      Truncates this transaction log at the given zxid.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        void append(Transaction txn)
            throws IOException
        Appends a request to transaction log.
        Parameters:
        txn - the transaction which will be appended to log.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures

      • truncate

        void truncate(Zxid zxid)
              throws IOException
        Truncates this transaction log at the given zxid. This method deletes all the transactions with zxids higher than the given zxid.
        Parameters:
        zxid - the transaction id.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures

      • getLatestZxid

        Zxid getLatestZxid()
                   throws IOException
        Gets the latest transaction id from log.
        Returns:
        the transaction id of the latest transaction. Return Zxid.ZXID_NOT_EXIST if the log is empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures

      • getIterator

        Log.LogIterator getIterator(Zxid zxid)
                            throws IOException
        Gets an iterator to read transactions from this log starting at the given zxid (including zxid).
        Parameters:
        zxid - the id of the transaction. If zxid id null, return the iterator from beginning of the log.
        Returns:
        an iterator to read the next transaction in logs.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures

      • sync

        void sync()
          throws IOException
        Syncs all the appended transactions to the physical media.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures

      • trim

        void trim(Zxid zxid)
          throws IOException
        Trim the log up to the transaction of zxid inclusively.
        Parameters:
        zxid - the last zxid(inclusive) which will be trimed to.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes the log file and release the resource.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failures
